page.title: 13PLACES IN FLEET
page.content:
{The Post Office}is on Reading Road South, opposite Heatherside School. It sells sweets, toys, cards, stamps, notebooks, pens and pencils, bookmarks and ornaments. It has a Post Box in front of the shop. Fleet has other Post Offices in the town.
{The Civic Hall}is beside the library. It is used for plays, concerts, dances, sales and sometimes a fashion show.These entertainments are often run by amateurs and for charity.
{The Supermarket}has food set out on shelves for customers to see and choose from.Customers wheel their trolleys full of food to the tills where the staff sit to add up the prices. Fleet has more than one supermarket. Most have a car park.
